Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 41 runs off 21 balls
Jasprit Bumrah took 4 wickets for 7 runs in 4 overs
Pre-Game Insights: India's batters did well to upset the rhythm of the game, never going into their shell even as Afghanistan struck early
India's bowlers have benefited from how no one apart from Rahmanullah Gurbaz really came at them
India overcame the conditions with Suryakumar Yadav in the first innings
Post-Match Reflections: With Afghanistan throttled at 134, you get an even better idea of how well India played to get 181 and the value their no-more-safety-first batting approach brings
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first Super Eight game in the T20 World Cup 2024 for India
The pitch, once again, was tough to bat on, slow and offering purchase to everyone willing to roll their fingers across the ball
Others: The T20 World Cup final will be taking place here
The game was played in Bridgetown, Barbados
